sentences.sContent: Oddly enough, that is precisely what I intend.
sentences.sCn: 说也奇怪， 那正是我的打算。

sentences.sContent: They intend to be an army of light against the onslaught of darkness.
sentences.sCn: 他们打算成为一支光明之师对抗黑暗军团的猛烈进攻。

sentences.sContent: ...Anyone interested or intend to inquire about please do not feel hesitated to contact Xiao Li...
...many young people intend to experience different cultures...
...Why does the man intend to grow potatoes rather than corn on the farm...

phrases.pCn: 希望有或接到；打算成为……

remMethod.val: in(使…) ＋ tend(趋向) → 趋向做 → 打算使(成为)

words.tran: 故意的，有意的；打算中的

trans.tranOther: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it.
